review: This beaded necklace is absolutely stunning! The quality is amazing, and it looks even better in person.
I love the craftsmanship of the wooden table, but it could have been packed better for delivery.
The ceramic mug set is beautiful! A perfect addition to my kitchen. Highly recommend!
Not bad, but the color is a bit different from what I expected. Still a nice item overall.
The leather wallet is very sturdy, but it feels a little heavier than I expected.
Excellent service and the handwoven scarf is incredibly soft. Will definitely buy more from this shop.
The jewelry set is beautiful, but the chain broke after a week of use. Disappointed with the durability.
Fantastic quality on the handmade basket! The colors are vibrant, and it adds such a lovely touch to my home.
The hand-painted vase is gorgeous, but it took a little longer than expected to arrive.
The handmade soap smells great, but I expected it to last longer. It's a bit small for the price.
